questions.question: What is the main reason for connecting the LM35 sensor's Vout pin to Arduino's A0 pin?

answers.a: Because A0 is the only analog pin available
answers.b: Because the LM35 provides an analog signal, and A0 is an analog input pin
answers.c: Because A0 is the fastest input pin
answers.d: Because A0 is for power supply

questions.question: What is the NPN transistor used for in your project's circuit?

answers.a: To reduce the brightness of the LED
answers.b: To act as a switch between the Arduino and the LED
answers.c: To provide power to the relay coil

questions.question: What happens if you don't use a 220Ω resistor with the LED?

answers.a: The LED will be brighter and burn out quickly
answers.b: The LED will not light up at all.
answers.c: The LCD display will stop working.
answers.d: The Arduino board will be damaged
